projects.title: Measurabl: Insights Module
projects.subtitle: Customizable analytics for real estate sustainability data
projects.roles: Led discovery and ideation, prototyped features with AI, defined information architecture and dashboards, and oversaw product rollout and efficacy analysis
projects.description: A flexible analytics tool that helps real estate teams explore sustainability data, spot trends and improvement opportunities, and share clear, customized reports. Includes ready-made dashboards with rich filtering and normalization options.

projects.title: Measurabl: Portfolio Trends Feature
projects.subtitle: Lightweight analytics for portfolio performance
projects.roles: Drove customer discovery, prototyping, and frontend development; ran usability testing; and managed feature rollout and impact analysis
projects.description: A streamlined analytics tool for visualizing real estate sustainability trends. Enables filtering, normalization, and quick pattern discovery. Serves as an entry-level product that introduces users to Measurabl's analytics capabilities.

projects.title: Measurabl: Disclosure Module
projects.subtitle: Unified sustainability reporting across multiple frameworks
projects.roles: Led research and ideation, built AI-based prototypes, wrote mathematical specs, oversaw development and rollout, and analyzed efficacy
projects.description: A single interface for reporting to multiple sustainability frameworks, each with unique rules. Lets users fine-tune how each property is disclosed, replacing costly manual consulting workflows.

projects.title: Measurabl: Framework Reporting Feature (Legacy)
projects.subtitle: Step-by-step sustainability reporting made simple
projects.roles: Researched customer pain points, designed UI, developed frontend, and managed the feature through its entire lifecycle
projects.description: An early reporting tool that guided customers through sustainability disclosures step by step, replacing a complex manual process. Later superseded by the more advanced Disclosure module.
